prompt: Design an engine control unit with STM32F407VGT6 processor, MCP2562 CAN transceiver, VNQ5050 quad high-side driver for injectors, BTS7008 for ignition coils, 8MHz crystal with 20pF load caps, LM2940-5.0 for 5V rail, AMS1117-3.3 for 3.3V rail, 100uF bulk caps, and 0.1uF decoupling per IC.

Design a throttle body controller with STM32F103C8T6, L9960 H-bridge for DC motor, TLE4913 hall sensors, MCP2551 CAN interface, INA180 current sense with 10mOhm shunt, 5V LDO using LM7805, 0.33uF and 0.1uF caps, and TVS protection on all I/O.

Design a fuel injection ECU with ATmega2560, TLE8888QK smart driver for 4 injectors, 2x IPS1025H high-side switches, SN65HVD230 CAN transceiver, 16MHz crystal, MC33269D-5.0 regulator, MAP sensor interface with op-amp buffer using LM358.

Design a diesel glow plug controller with STM32G431KB, 4x BTS555 high-side switches for glow plugs, LIN transceiver TJA1020, current monitoring via INA219 on I2C, TPS54302 5V buck converter with 10uH inductor and 22uF caps.

Design an ignition timing controller with dsPIC33FJ128MC804, dual VB525 ignition drivers, MAX9926 VR sensor conditioner, TCAN334 CAN-FD transceiver, LM5007 buck with 47uH inductor, knock sensor interface with bandpass filter.

Design a mechanical keyboard controller with ATmega32U4, USB-C connector with CC resistors 5.1k, TPD4E05U06 ESD protection, IS31FL3733 LED driver for RGB backlighting, 16MHz crystal with 22pF caps, 10k pull-up on reset, key matrix diodes 1N4148.

Design a wireless split keyboard with NRF52840, USB2422 hub controller, ISSI IS31FL3741 LED matrix driver, MCP73831 LiPo charger, BQ27441 fuel gauge, AP2112K-3.3 LDO, 32MHz crystal, per-key RGB with SK6812MINI-E.

metadata.subcircuit_components: NRF52, USB hub, LED driver, battery

prompt: Design a gaming keyboard with STM32F411CEU6, 2x IS31FL3736 LED drivers on I2C, USB Type-C with FUSB302 PD controller, W25Q32 flash for profiles, rotary encoder EC11, OLED display SSD1306, 4.7k I2C pull-ups.

Design a 65% keyboard PCB with RP2040 microcontroller, WS2812B addressable LEDs, USB-C with ESD7004 protection, 12MHz crystal with 20pF caps, 3.3V LDO MIC5504, hot-swap sockets with Kailh CPG151101S11.
Design a numpad with CH552G USB MCU, AW9523 I/O expander for matrix, SK6812 LEDs, USB2.0 with PRTR5V0U2X ESD, LDO XC6206P332MR, 24MHz crystal, 100nF decoupling per IC, 4.7uF on USB VBUS.

Design a 4-port USB 2.0 hub with USB2514B controller, 4x AP2152 power switches with current limiting, ESD protection using TPD4S012, 24MHz crystal with 18pF caps, 1.1V core LDO using TLV70011, 3.3V I/O LDO using AP2112K.

Design a USB 3.0 hub with VL817 controller, TPS2044 quad power switch, SP0503 ESD diodes on each port, 25MHz crystal, RT9193-33 3.3V LDO, RT9193-12 1.2V LDO, 47uF bulk caps, USB-C upstream with CC1/CC2 resistors.

Design a powered USB hub with FE1.1s controller, SY6280 power switches per port, NCP1117-3.3 LDO, 12MHz crystal with 22pF caps, overcurrent protection using AP22802, LED indicators per port with 1k resistors.
Design a USB-C hub with USB5734 controller, HD3SS3220 USB-C mux, TPS65982 PD controller, TPS2561 eFuse per port, PI3USB9281 charger detector, 48MHz crystal, dual LDOs for 3.3V and 1.0V rails.

Design a 7-port USB hub with USB2517 controller, TPS2052 dual power switches, USBLC6-2 ESD protection per port, 24MHz crystal, TLV1117-33 LDO, external 12V to 5V buck using TPS54331 with 15uH inductor.

Design a flight computer with STM32F405RGT6, MPU6050 IMU on I2C, BMP280 barometer, NEO-M8N GPS on UART, W25Q128 flash on SPI, AMS1117-3.3 LDO, 8MHz crystal with 20pF caps, 4.7k I2C pull-ups, 100nF per IC.

Design a model rocket flight computer with RP2040, ICM-20948 9-axis IMU, MS5611 barometer, SX1276 LoRa module, MicroSD card slot, MCP73831 LiPo charger, BQ27441 fuel gauge, 12MHz crystal, pyro channels with IRLML6344.

Design a quadcopter FC with STM32F722RET6, dual IMU with BMI270 and ICM42688P, DPS310 barometer, AT7456E OSD chip, 4x BLHeli32 ESC interfaces, 8MHz HSE crystal, 5V BEC input, 3.3V LDO, SD card logging.

Design a fixed-wing autopilot with STM32H743VIT6, ADIS16470 IMU, ublox MAX-M10S GPS, RFD900 telemetry interface, PWM outputs for 8 servos using PCA9685, magnetometer LIS3MDL, airspeed sensor MPXV7002DP, SD logging.

Design a high-altitude balloon tracker with ATmega328P, UBLOX MAX-8Q GPS, Si4463 radio transmitter, BME280 environmental sensor, DS18B20 temperature sensors, 2x AA boost converter TPS61200, 8MHz crystal, solar MPPT.

Design a BLDC motor controller with STM32G474RET6, DRV8301 gate driver, 6x IRFB4110 MOSFETs, INA240A2 current sense with 1mOhm shunts, AS5047P encoder on SPI, MCP2562 CAN, 25MHz crystal, 3.3V and 12V rails.

Design an e-bike controller with GD32F103RCT6, FD6288 gate driver, 6x NCE6080 MOSFETs, hall sensor inputs with 10k pull-ups, LM5164 60V buck for logic power, thermistor input, regen braking support, 72V max input.

Design a servo drive with STM32F446RET6, 2x IR2110 gate drivers for H-bridge, ACS712 current sensor, AM4096 magnetic encoder, RS485 interface using MAX485, isolated DC-DC B0505S, 8MHz crystal with 20pF caps.
Design a gimbal controller with STM32F405RGT6, 3x L6234 3-phase drivers, 3x AS5600 magnetic encoders on I2C, MPU6050 IMU, CAN interface MCP2551, 5V UBEC input, 3.3V LDO, PWM input capture for RC.

Design a stepper motor controller with TMC5160 driver, STM32F042K6T6 for USB interface, optical encoder AEDR-8300 input, LM2596 5V buck with 33uH inductor, step/dir interface, stall detection output, SPI configuration.

Design a 12V to 5V 3A buck converter with TPS54360B, 22uH inductor SPR1265A-220M, SS34 Schottky diode, 22uF MLCC input caps, 100uF output caps, feedback network 49.9k and 10k for 5V output, soft-start 10nF.
Design an isolated flyback with TNY290PG, EE16 transformer 1mH primary, PC817 optocoupler, TL431 reference, MB10S bridge rectifier, Y1 cap 2.2nF, X2 cap 100nF, output 5V 2A with LC filter.
Design a 4-switch buck-boost with LM5176, 4x BSC016N06NS MOSFETs, 10uH coupled inductor, INA181 current sense, 100uF input/output caps, 12V to 48V input range, 24V output 5A, compensation network.
Design a synchronous buck with TPS562200, 4.7uH inductor XAL5030-472ME, 22uF ceramic output caps, 10uF input caps, enable with 100k pull-up, soft-start, output 3.3V 2A from 5-17V input, thermal pad.

Design a boost converter for LED backlight with TPS61165, 10uH inductor, Schottky diode SS14, 10uF input cap, 1uF output cap, feedback resistor for 25V output, PWM dimming input, OVP set at 28V with 1M resistor.

Design an audio system with PCM5102A DAC on I2S, TPA3116D2 Class-D amplifier, 22uF input coupling caps, 10uH output filter inductors, 680uF output caps, 1000uF bulk power cap, 100nF bootstrap caps, BTL 2x50W output.

Design a USB audio interface with PCM2902 codec, TLV320AIC3104 ADC, OPA2134 headphone amp, USB-B connector with ESD, 12MHz crystal, 3.3V LDO TPS73733, balanced XLR input with transformer, 48V phantom power.
Design a Bluetooth speaker with ESP32-WROVER, MAX98357A I2S amplifier, PAM8403 stereo amp, TP4056 LiPo charger, DW01 battery protection, SPK0641HT4H MEMS mic, 0.1uF decoupling, 3W speaker outputs.

Design a guitar effects processor with STM32H750VBT6, WM8731 codec, 2x OPA2604 buffers, relay true bypass using G6K-2F-Y, OLED SSD1309, rotary encoders EC11, 9V to 5V buck TPS62840, EEPROM 24LC256 for presets.

Design an FM radio receiver with SI4703 tuner, TDA7266 stereo amplifier, STM32F030K6T6 for control, SSD1306 OLED display, rotary encoder, LM386 headphone amp, 32.768kHz crystal for SI4703, 8MHz for MCU.
Design an IoT gateway with ESP32-S3-WROOM-1, RFM95W LoRa module on SPI, ENC28J60 Ethernet on SPI, W25Q64 flash, DS3231 RTC with battery backup, AMS1117-3.3 LDO, USB-C with CH340N, 4.7k I2C pull-ups.

Design a solar-powered sensor node with STM32L476RG, BME680 environmental sensor, VEML7700 light sensor, SX1262 LoRa, CN3065 solar charger, TPS63000 buck-boost, LiFePO4 battery, 32.768kHz LSE crystal.
Design a Zigbee coordinator with CC2652R, W5500 Ethernet, ESP32-C3 for WiFi bridge, CP2102N USB-UART, 48MHz and 32.768kHz crystals, 3.3V LDO AP2112K, status LEDs, external antenna via U.FL connector.

Design a Matter bridge with NRF52840, ESP32-C6 for Thread/WiFi, ATECC608A secure element, USB-C with FUSB302, MCP73831 LiPo charger, TPS62840 ultra-low-power buck, WS2812B status LED, QSPI flash IS25LP032D.

Design an industrial Modbus gateway with STM32F107VCT6, W5100 Ethernet, MAX3485 RS485 with 120R termination, ISO7241 digital isolator, isolated DC-DC ROE-0505S, 25MHz HSE crystal, RJ45 with magnetics HR911105A.

Design a 6S LiPo BMS with BQ76940 AFE, STM32L151C8T6 host MCU, external balancing with SI2301 P-FETs and 33R resistors, NVMFS5C628NL charge/discharge FETs, 10k NTC thermistors, 100nF cell filtering, CAN interface.

Design an e-bike battery pack BMS with BQ76952 16S AFE, STM32G071RBT6 control, AUIRFS8409 low-side FETs, pre-charge circuit with 100R 5W resistor and relay, cell taps through 100R fusing resistors, I2C isolation with ISO1540.

Design a solar MPPT charger with LT3652 controller, 47uH inductor, SS34 diode, INA219 current/voltage monitor, STM32F030F4P6 for display, SSD1306 OLED, load switch using AO3401, 4S LiFePO4 charging profile.
Design a UPS battery backup with BQ24715 SMBus charger, BQ40Z50 fuel gauge, TPS2113A power mux, LTC4359 ideal diode, 2S2P 18650 pack, 5V output via TPS563200 buck, USB-C PD input using CYPD3177.

Design a power bank with IP5306 power path IC, 4x parallel 18650 cells, USB-A output with auto-detect BC1.2 using TS5USBA224, USB-C input/output with FUSB302 PD, LED fuel gauge, button input for power-on.

Design a precision ADC front-end with ADS1256 24-bit ADC, PGA281 programmable gain amp, REF5025 2.5V reference, OPA2277 input buffers, 4th order Sallen-Key filter at 1kHz, LP5907-3.3 low-noise LDO, guarded analog layout.

Design an oscilloscope front-end with AD8065 FET-input buffer, ADG1409 analog mux for range selection, AD8129 differential driver, AD9283 8-bit 100MSPS ADC, CDCE913 PLL for clock, 10x/1x probe detection circuit.

Design a function generator with AD9833 DDS, AD8045 output buffer, AD5292 digital potentiometer for amplitude, relay switching for output impedance, STM32F103C8T6 control, SSD1306 display, rotary encoder interface.

Design a bench multimeter with ICL7135 4.5-digit ADC, ICL8069 1.2V reference, CD4052 analog mux, current shunts 0.1R/1R/10R, OPA2277 input buffer, MAX7219 LED driver for 7-segment display, fuse protection.

Design an LCR meter with AD5933 impedance analyzer, AD8606 rail-to-rail op-amps, ADG849 SPDT switches for range, ADS1115 for DC bias measurement, STM32G431KB control, I2C OLED, frequency range 1Hz-100kHz.
